channel.title: Projects on Tech and Coffee
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Tech and Coffee

item.title: Automating a Recipe Server Deployment: FastAPI, Terraform, and Ansible
item.description: This article explains how to build a server with FastAPI, Terraform, and Ansible in a automation workflow.It tell you about AWS provisioning, secure configuration with Ansible Vault, and app deployment with systemd services.

item.title: AWS History 0 - The Hidden Costs of Poor Cloud Management
item.description: The beginning of some histories about AWS cloud. This one is about EC2, S3 configuration and a little bit of Linux server management

item.title: AWS History 1 - An attack and Three tier solution
item.description: The beginning of some histories about AWS cloud. This one is about EC2, S3 configuration and a little bit of Linux server management
